rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with colonial design elements, suitable for receiving guests.
Open living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to the west side ensuring ample natural light.
Adjacent dining area with a colonial style, complementing the living room layout.
Modern kitchen integrated with colonial detailing and practical design to accommodate family activities.
Guest bedroom, equipped with a balcony ensuring privacy.
Master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony in accordance with Vastu recommendations for the south or west orientation.
Additional bedroom featuring a balcony, designed to be spacious yet cozy.

openings.description: Main entrance door with colonial style detailing.
Spacious balconies for each bedroom ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Designated access to the swimming pool located at the rear of the property, with integrated colonial aesthetics.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the first floor, designed with a spacious balcony.
Cozy study room integrated into the colonial duplex layout for home office needs.

openings.description: Balconies designed for each bedroom to ensure natural light and adherence to Vastu principles.
Staircase connecting ground and first floor with colonial styling.
